name: Shape Walker
description:
Shape Walker is a puzzle game where you must trace the outline of a shape in order to complete its reflection.

The catch? The player only moves when you move! This game detects your body's angle and motion and uses that to move your character around on the screen. Shape Walker was made to get you in shape by... walking! :)

Note: The game must be played on a mobile device because it uses the gyroscope and accelerometer for in-game movement! (Game only tested on an Android device)

How To Play:

  • The goal is to collect all of the stars on the outline of the shape
  • To rotate the player, rotate your body
  • To move the player, you can either:
    • Walk forwards in the direction you're facing
    • Walk in place if you have no space to move
    • Move your phone up and down slightly to simulate moving (the lazyman option)
  • Stick to the outline of the shape. If you venture outside of the outline, you will lose health
  • Avoid hitting eyeballs
  • Keep an eye on the timer

There are 20 levels currently and a global leaderboard to check how you stack up against the world.

Made using Phaser for the 2021 Jammin Game Jam.
